title: Fabrication of nano filler doped PVA/starch biodegradable composites with enhanced thermal conduction, water barrier and antimicrobial performance for food industry

Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Sabiha Sultana, Sohail Imran, Amir Naveed, Sardar Hussain, Rozina Khattak, Luqman Ali Shah, Kamran Rehan, Imran Rehan, Mujeeb Ur Rehman, Uzma Hashmat, Farzana Haider
